name: Teardrop Breakfast Table
description: The Teardrop Breakfast Table makes for a dramatic statement piece in any space. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KBT01. Handmade. Antique Black Shagreen surface, bronze-patina brass legs. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, but this showcases the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
